text: Dearest n\0,
Dear n\0,
To my good friend n\0!
To my favorite influencer,
A gift? For moi? Well, thank you!

A gift for me, just out of the blue?
You're always full of surprises.

A surprise present for me? Grazie
mille! I gladly accept.

Surprising someone with a gift
is always in style.

Whoa! What did I do to deserve
something this cool?

The funny thing is...I had a primo
present already picked out for
you too!

Well, guess what... I got you
something too! Ha HA! I hope
you can hear that laugh out loud.

I'm sending you the freshest item
from the 

\0n
\0

 catalog.
It's tasteful yet zazzy.

I don't want you to think I spent
too much time shopping for a
return gift, but it was six hours.

Well, I've actually got something
for you too. I thought long and
hard before selecting this...
It's going to blow your mind.
Please, I want you to have it.
Put it in heavy rotation, OK?
Think of me whenever you see it.
Take good care of it, alright?
Truly, n
Your pal, n
Sincèrement, n
Yours, n
Always, n
